title: epiplots
text: epiplots inspired ggpubr. Like ggpubr aims make building publication ready ggplots easier faster, specific focus types plots used epidemiology. Think time series regression summaries. epiplots also includes variety geoms utility functions useful extras.

title: Date Axis — date_axis
text: Adds attractive date axis timeseries plot. date_axis automatically removes title elemnt x-axis.

title: Date Axis — date_axis
code: date_axis(   date_breaks = "3 months",   limits = NULL,   labels = scales::label_date_short() )

title: Date Axis — date_axis
text: date_breaks str Breaks used specified format '[#] [unit]', example : '2 weeks'. Default '3 months'. limits date vct Axis limits used. Default NULL, allowing ggplot2::scale_x_date() set limits automatically. labels fct Allows users set labels needed. Default scales::label_date_short().

what: Label Sections of a Timeseries — geom_time_periods
title: Label Sections of a Timeseries — geom_time_periods
text: Adds vertical lines time series plot cutting plot different sections, typically different waves epidemic. horizontally centered label added section user specified height. Warning : opinionated function specific column name requirements periods argument.

title: Label Sections of a Timeseries — geom_time_periods
Label Sections of a Timeseries — geom_time_periods
text: y dbl Y axis value section labels. periods df Data frame contaning time period labels, start dates, end dates. columns must named "label", "start", "end" respectively. color str Color use vertical lines labels. Default grey (#c5c5c5).

title: Label Sections of a Timeseries — geom_time_periods
Second Axis — second_axis
text: Adds secondary vertical axis right side ggplot based scale factor main (left) vertical axis. *Note : *  default secondary axis line, ticks. desired, axis line must added manually user.

title: Second Axis — second_axis
code: second_axis(   scale_factor,   percent = FALSE,   digits = 0,   formatter = NULL,   title = NULL,   color = "#c5c5c5" )

title: Second Axis — second_axis
text: scale_factor dbl Scale factor convert main (left) axis new secondary (right) axis percent bool Convenience argument generating percent formatted axis. Default FALSE. digits int Number decimal digits use percent TRUE. Default 0. formatter fct Formatter use axis labels. option superceeded percent TRUE. title str Axis title. Default NULL. color str Axis color (ticks, title, values). Default grey (#c5c5c5).

title: Clean ggplot Theme — theme_clean
text: Adds base theme ggplot; intended publication ready.

title: Clean ggplot Theme — theme_clean
code: theme_clean(   base_size = 20,   legend_x = NULL,   legend_y = NULL,   lines = FALSE,   title_hjust = 0,   subtitle_hjust = title_hjust )

title: Clean ggplot Theme — theme_clean
text: base_size int Base size theme (text sizing). Default 14. legend_x dbl Horizontal legend location. Default NULL. legend_y dbl Vertical legend location. Default NULL. lines bool Whether plot y-axis grid lines. Default FALSE. title_hjust dbl Alignment plot title. Default left aligned. subtitle_hjust dbl Alignment subtitle. Default match alignment title.
